he.appendTitle: Append a new field with type 'auto' after this field (Ctrl+Shift+Ins)
he.appendSubmenuTitle: Select the type of the field to be appended
he.appendTitleAuto: Append a new field with type 'auto' (Ctrl+Shift+Ins)
he.ascendingTitle: Sort the childs of this ${type} in ascending order
he.compactTitle: Compact JSON data, remove all whitespaces (Ctrl+Shift+\)
he.descendingTitle: Sort the childs of this ${type} in descending order
he.expandTitle:
Click to expand/collapse this field (Ctrl+E). 
Ctrl+Click to expand/collapse including all childs.
he.formatTitle: Format JSON data, with proper indentation and line feeds (Ctrl+\)
he.insertTitle: Insert a new field with type 'auto' before this field (Ctrl+Ins)
he.insertSub: Select the type of the field to be inserted
he.repairTitle: תיקון JSON: fix quotes and escape characters, remove comments and JSONP notation, turn JavaScript objects into JSON.
he.sortFieldTitle: Select the nested field by which to sort the array or object
he.sortAscendingTitle: Sort the selected field in ascending order
he.sortDescendingTitle: Sort the selected field in descending order
he.transformTitle: Filter, sort, or transform the childs of this ${type}
he.transformTitleShort: סינון, מיון או המרה של תוכן
he.openUrl: Ctrl+Click or Ctrl+Enter to open url in new window
he.validationCannotMove: Cannot move a field into a child of itself
he.autoType: Field type "auto". The field type is automatically determined from the value and can be a string, number, boolean, or null.
he.objectType: Field type "object". An object contains an unordered set of key/value pairs.
he.arrayType: Field type "array". An array contains an ordered collection of values.
he.stringType: Field type "string". Field type is not determined from the value, but always returned as string.
